```{r}
data <- read.csv("diabetes_data_upload.csv")
```

```{r}
positive <- data[data$class == "Positive",]
negative <- data[data$class == "Negative",]
```

```{r}
keeps <- c("muscle.stiffness", "weakness", "visual.blurring", "Irritability", 
           "Alopecia", "Polyuria", "Polydipsia", "sudden.weight.loss", 
           "Polyphagia", "partial.paresis", "class")
```

```{r}
positive = positive[keeps]
negative = negative[keeps]
positive = positive[1:200,]
```

```{r}
sum(positive$muscle.stiffness == "No") / 200; sum(positive$muscle.stiffness == "Yes") / 200
sum(negative$muscle.stiffness == "No") / 200; sum(negative$muscle.stiffness == "Yes") / 200
```
